name: Looper - Save The Twain
description:
Looper - Save The Twain is a majestic arcade fun game, filled with excitement.

The rules are simple:
Tap to rotate the Twain looper in any direction you want. Make sure you avoid collision with the different barriers. Escape through different bottleneck passages to complete the level

Seems simple Eh? Try yourself and find out.
Growing pace with rhythm will make your head spin.
